# Quantification 

## Download files needed for cell ranger

We need to download 2 files:

1. Cell Ranger Binaries (3.1.0)
2. Cell Ranger mouse reference (3.0.0)
Source: https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/downloads/latest

## Run Cell Ranger

```{bash}
export PATH=/home/risso/src/cellranger-3.1.0:$PATH

cellranger count --id=sample_1C \
  --fastqs=/home/risso/data/peixoto_2020-01/1C \
  --sample=1C \
  --transcriptome=/home/risso/data/references/refdata-cellranger-mm10-3.0.0
```
